# Reflections of Divine Majesty
## Scripture
"In the beginning, God created the heavens and the earth." - Genesis 1:1

## Reflection
As we gaze up at the winter sky, we are reminded of the vastness and majesty of God's creation. The stars twinkle like diamonds against the blackness of space, a celestial showcase of God's infinite power and wisdom. Just as the universe operates according to physical laws and patterns, our lives are also governed by spiritual laws and rhythms. The phases of the moon, the orbits of the planets, and the dance of the constellations all point to a deeper reality - that our lives are part of a larger, divine plan. As we reflect on the beauty and complexity of the universe, we are drawn to the Creator Himself, who spoke all things into being and sustains them by His word.

## Prayer
Dear Heavenly Father, as we marvel at the wonder of Your creation, we are reminded of Your majesty and power. Help us to see our lives as part of a larger, divine plan, and to trust in Your sovereignty over all things. May the beauty of the night sky inspire us to worship and adore You, and may we reflect Your glory to a world in need of Your light. Amen.
